ua.ll7.posterminal.api

Interface POSTerminalAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    POSTerminal

    public interface POSTerminalAPI
    PointOfSaleTerminal 10.09.13 : 22:07 Alex Velichko alex.velichko.kyiv@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTotal

        java.math.BigDecimal calculateTotal()
        The required part of the API

      • scan

        void scan(java.lang.String order)
        The required part of the API
        Here we use String, as is in the requirements:
        Scan these items in this order: ABCDABA;

      • setPricing

        void setPricing(java.lang.Character productCode,
              int productQuantity,
              float productPackPrice)
        The required part of the API
        Set (write) product pricing
        Parameters:
        productCode - product code. We have to use Character, as in the requirements.
        productQuantity - Quantity of products in one pack. May be 1. 0 - is up to upper system level.
        productPackPrice - Price for such product pack. 0 - is up to upper system level.

      • isReadyForGetTotal

        boolean isReadyForGetTotal()
        If the terminal not know about anything in the order, or
        if the terminal not know price for quantity=1 in the pack return false.

      • getLastErrors

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLastErrors()
        Get last errors, if any.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of errors descriptors (if any errors from scanning orders) or empty list (i.e. with 0 size).
        Achtung! Never returns null, if errors are absent - result will be just empty.
